Text:
Awesome release -This is a hidden gem!
I can see that the list of ur followers hv grown coz of the high quality releases.. Keep up the fabulous work.
2 requests & suggestions of rare movies u can upload (Only if you can find the hi res sources - not sure if they are available):
1. Where the Truth Lies(imdb: tt0373450)
2. The Moguls(imdb: tt0405163)
According to blu-ray.com neither of those have been released in HD unfortunately. Thanks so much for the positive feedback. Good comments keep me motivated. :)
i see you've increased the VIDEO BITRATE significantly there...but still the size is so small...hell of a work...keep going..
